title: Rise Against - Appeal To Reason (2008)
description:
As usual, I have it first. I pre-ordered both a hardcopy and the digital version of this album, because that&#039;s how much I love this band. I don&#039;t think any amount of filesharing could ever hurt their following, and they&#039;ll always make what they put into their albums times five hundred bazillion. Nonetheless, as usual I encourage you to support the band by purchasing the album. I also encourage you to seed this torrent as it is going to be slow if I&#039;m the only one doing it. I&#039;ve removed support on my torrent program for the songs "Little Boxes" and "Re-Education Through Labor" as they are both included here and that would be redundant. Further, an additional file is included in the form of a booklet that was received alongside the digital copy. If you&#039;d like to thank me for doing this, buy a copy of the album yourself. I share music I think the world needs to hear. That&#039;s all. Of course I have my own projects that need supporting and are not receiving such, but oh well, no sense crying. I&#039;m not as good as these guys, though I hope one day when my music is for sale, someone who feels the world deserves to hear it will share it on the pirate bay, the world&#039;s best torrent site.

Thanks.
phm
